sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>Delete old form sections and elements. Its not safe to use DELETE records for UI sections because the way they are coalesced by the update manager can cause future upgrades to delete records you didn't want deleted.</description> <name>remove_old_var_default_form</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_section"); gr.addQuery("name", "var_dictionary"); gr.addQuery("view", "Default view"); gr.deleteMultiple(); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>russ.sarbora</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-12-16 21:31:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1ed86ae4533b2200566d435723dc34be</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>remove_old_var_default_form</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Variables for GlideRecords" source="com.glide.vars">d653f8a03c31311068bcf327dfe37f67</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1ed86ae4533b2200566d435723dc34be</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>russ.sarbora</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-12-16 21:36:48</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
